content.title: Live Preview
content.body:
1. From the Live Preview Settings window, under Native, select the checkboxes next to the OS of the mobile/tablet on which you are going to view the app.
    For example: iOS and Android.
    Make sure you have unselected all the other platforms and channels.
  2. Click Save & Run.
    It may take some time for Iris to show the Live Preview is ready window.
